customer_reviews.author: Daniel H. Reese

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Makes awesome Chaffles. Easy to use. Still isn't sticking. I love Breville. I have an Espresso machine and a hand mixer that are just built to last. Love it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Waffle Maker
customer_reviews.text: Finally found a great waffle maker that's deep & makes big waffles. The drip tray is awesome as it cooks whatever drips out. Very easy to clean with soap & warm water - batter comes right off.
customer_reviews.author: JLY

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I debated on this for a long time, read every review and watched videos. It does a beautiful job and nothing sticks to it, I even cooked cinnamon rolls in it, hash browns and the works. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mother Beck

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny! This waffle maker is awesome. Leaves no residue in the well and all you have to do is wipe it out. Waffles come out perfect every time. Everyone loves the taste of the waffles too. Glad I bought it over some of the cheaper brands. Also love the plug! Neat asset!
customer_reviews.author: Chris V. Estes

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: Considering Walmart has $10.00 waffle irons for sale,I took a leap of faith in buying this...It far exceeded my expectations..Amazing product..
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth G. Shank

customer_reviews.title: Great design but I believe my unit has a shortage
customer_reviews.text: Waffles —great design and it is beautiful— however I believe mine has a shortage. The timer stArts after I play with it —open and close it etc.. I paid to much to have these issues within a week of purchasing it
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: None Better!
customer_reviews.text: Also have a Chef's Choice premium iron that is awesome! This one is MUCH better! Great quality, cleans easy, multi-functional, does not stick at all!
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: The Cadillac of waffle makers
customer_reviews.text: This waffle maker is great!! I've tried a few different recipes & settings and every one has turned out perfect. A couple of my favorite features are the overflow moat, saves me every time, and the timer/beep to let me know when the waffles are done, no more babysitting the waffles. My daughter likes me to make a big batch so I can freeze them for her; she pops it in the toaster oven or micro and they make a easy breakfast that she can eat on the way to the bus. I highly recommend this product, as well as many other Breville products.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Very good Waffle maker!
customer_reviews.text: The family was sad I got rid of the old waffle maker, till they saw how much better this model was. Easy to select a heat the deep waffle well cooks better, and the "moat" surrounding the waffles makes cleanup easier.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: If you have the money and like waffles then there is no reason you wouldn’t buy this. It’s awesome!! It’s easy to clean, has PFOA free non stick coating and makes amazing waffles.
customer_reviews.author: GS

customer_reviews.title: Really good 👍
customer_reviews.text: I love this wafflealer.I don't have to think, the waffle maker does all the thinking for me. Lol I just pour in the mix, select the setting, wait for the waffle maker to signal it's finish
customer_reviews.author: Kyra B.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: Love the ability to set timing and crispness with the digital settings. Overflow moat is a nice feature as well. Bigger counter top footprint than I would like I store in the pantry. It's working great.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Radtke

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean! Due to it's size, it's Ideal for exploring new techniques in cooking!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia K.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Wafflemaker
customer_reviews.text: Cooks waffles at a consistent temperature and you can vary the time. Will warm up fried chicken, fries, etc. A high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Desmond

customer_reviews.title: The best waffle maker ever!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy to have spent a little extra on a machine that makes fabulous waffles!! Perfect waffles every time!
customer_reviews.author: raeshelle
